markdownRemark.html:
Explore Task

Example Computational Artifacts from Code.org are available on Google Drive here

Examples plus scoring guidelines and notes for the Explore Task from collegeboard are available here

Here are the Explore Task Scoring Guidelines

The Explore Task Template from Code.org.

Create Task

Follow the link to the AP CSP Create Task Template, and create a copy of the google doc to modify for your submission.

Follow the link to the AP Digital Portfolio Guide and visit pages 12 and 13 for instructions on creating pdf's and videos for the Performance Task submissions.

If you would like an option for creating the rectangle and oval around your code without using Word, you can use Code Print. There is a tutorial video that includes how to save the result as a pdf here.

Here is a video describing the process of adding an abstraction to simplify a program in Code.org.

Link to full Create PT rubric for reference.

Link to Sample Responses and Scoring Guidelines/Notes

Google Drive Folder of Annotated Scores for Sample Responses
